entities.description: Level of difficulty in concentrating during the past 12 months due to emotions, nerves, or mental health.
Level of difficulty in going out of the house during the past 12 months due to emotions, nerves, or mental health.
Whether emotional problems kept the individual from leaving the house during the past 12 months.
Level of difficulty in dealing with people the individual did not know well during the past 12 months due to emotions, nerves, or mental health.
Different response options available for survey questions, such as no difficulty, mild difficulty, and severe difficulty.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's level of difficulty in concentrating due to mental health issues.
Indicates the respondent's level of difficulty in going out due to mental health issues.
Indicates if emotional problems kept the respondent from leaving the house.
Indicates the respondent's level of difficulty in dealing with strangers due to mental health issues.
Defines the response options available for each survey question.
